data.message:
Yo awsome collection i love that you've spent so many years dating all the way back to your childhood collecting and then building that colletion to this day i know you'll probably never see this becuse your so busy as a phinominal music artist and also facebook can be a pain somtimes lol i really hope you can see this comment your music has inspierd me to rap and keep on going with my life thank you for always being yourself in your music no matter what fucking idiots might say i love you your biggest fan Phoebe Brown ps:i wish you could know how i feel and how much you mean 2 me i love u 💘

Aka lol i littrally was gonna put this is stan referenceing the song but i just put my real name to avoid confusion. I hope you had a great 2016 so far your awsome
